TEXT.TITLE: RANSBURG CORP <RBG> 1ST QTR FEB 28 LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss 19 cts vs profit one ct Oper net loss 1,495,000 vs profit 50,000 Revs 52.3 mln vs 48.9 mln NOTE: Earnings exclude gains from utilization of tax loss carryforwards of 82,000 dlrs, or one ct a share vs 300,000 dlrs, or three cts a share Reuter
